column3: School of Psychology and Computer Science
column5: About the courseMSc IT Security helps you to develop your computing skills in the theory and practice of computer security and forensic technology. This requires an understanding of hardware, operating systems, communications software, attention to detail, creative problem-solving, investigative skills and an appreciation of computer threats and security counter-measures. You will also have the opportunity to work on a substantial project of your own choice. These skills can lead to a range of careers in systems management and computer security.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 12-18 months full time, up to 3 years
